verbs.description: The California billionaire who [V: has] been running a television campaign to impeach President Trump is under fire for his latest ad for politicizing Mother 's day . Here 's the controversial television ad : In the ad , a mother recalls her son 's slow descent from becoming a Republican , to a Trump fan , and into supporting right - wing causes until he ends up marching next to alt - right and neo - Nazis in Charlottesville . " Only a mother can catch the signs early . This Mother 's Day , talk to your child about the GOP . I wish I had , " she laments while taking a swig of wine . The video ends with the on screen text , " talk to your child about the GOP . Vote them out . " Here 's the reaction The controversial ad that appears to equate any involvement with the Republican party as the same as marching with racist neo - Nazis was slammed by even those on the left . Former Obama speechwriter Jon Lovett excoriated Steyer for …

" Here 's the reaction The controversial ad that appears to equate any involvement with the Republican party as the same as marching with racist neo - Nazis was slammed by even those on the left . Former Obama speechwriter Jon Lovett excoriated Steyer for …
